summary: SummaryBaBylissPRO Nano Titanium 1-1/4'' Ionic Straightening Iron's technology is paired with the benefits of pure titanium-coated plates for smooth, sleek styles.
details: DetailsFeatures1-1/4'' Ultra-smooth titanium plates conduct ultra-high heat and resist corrosionCeramic heater, instant heat-up and recoveryLED temperature settings - up to 450 FDigital ionic technology emits millions of negative ionsLimited 4-year manufacturer's warrantyDual VoltageBenefitsIonic technology is perfectly paired with the benefits of pure titanium-coated plates for the smoothest, sleekest stylesNatural ions reduce frizz while the stay-cool housing resists the ultra-high heat for comfortable handlingThe ceramic heater produces instant heat, up to 450 F, and fast heat recovery for styling efficiency with no damaging hot spotsItem 2211737

reviews.headline: I used once and wish I could return it.
reviews.comments: Doesn't get hot enough even at the highest level.

reviews.headline: Soft and straight
reviews.comments: Works really well on my hair and left it soft and straight.

reviews.headline: I would 100% buy this again
reviews.comments: I couldn't love it any more it literally leaves my hair straight with one pass üòç

reviews.headline: My favorite for over 10 years
reviews.comments: I have tried several brands and was thirties beyond words when I found BaByliss!!! Now I have two different kind of their straighteners, one if I want my hair REALLY straight and one when I want to give it a little bit of a curl at the end. They also stand by their guarantee!! Amazing through and through.

reviews.headline: A staple in my tools
reviews.comments: I have had the same one since 2010. I have very thick and coarse hair and it works great! I came here to buy another with bigger plates and see they have definitely gone up in price in the last 15 years. This used to be about $150‚Ä¶that's a shame! Maybe shop around, it could just be Ulta.

reviews.headline: Quit Working
reviews.comments: mine stopped working about 6-8 months after I purchased it. babyliss did exchange it out for me and gave me a brand new one. however, that one quit working on me as well. I ended up just calling it a loss, unfortunately.

reviews.headline: Great Straightening Iron
reviews.comments: I have purchased (3) of these straightening irons.   (1) for a best friend, (1) for my neices, and (1) for myself.  We all love this iron, it is a great straighener, flat iron and smoothing iron!!!  I would reccomend it to anyone wanting to wear their hair smooth and straight.  It is expensive but so worth the money!!!

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I had this straightener for less than two years and it quit working.  I  researched this item for MONTHS before I paid the expensive price.  Now it doesn't work.  When it was working it was great.  Now, it is just a paperweight.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This straighter has lasted me almost 12 years! Buying the same one so it can last me another 12 :)

reviews.headline: Great flat iron
reviews.comments: I love it! Heats up fast and works great.

reviews.headline: The Best
reviews.comments: Is the best in all, i really like how it makes your hair look so smoth

reviews.headline: just bought my second after 12 years!
reviews.comments: This was the first straightener I ever purchased, & I finally just decided to get a fresh one.  (I would attach the photo if I could!) Very reliable. Easy to grip. Good options for temperature settings, and it's consistent. Titanium plates are less damaging to hair than ceramic straighteners.

reviews.headline: just bought my second after 12 years!
reviews.comments: This was the first straightener I ever purchased, & I finally just decided to get a fresh one.  (I would attach the photo if I could!) Very reliable. Easy to grip. Good options for temperature settings, and it's consistent. Titanium plates are less damaging to hair than ceramic straighteners.

reviews.headline: Finally old enough to buy my own after using my moms for yrs
reviews.comments: My mom has had this straightener for as long as I can remember, I used it everyday in high school and we are a family of 5 girls so it's used ALOT! We take it on every trip we go on, 2 hr trip or a vacation it doesn't matter. I have wavy hair and my mom has curly and it heats up so fast multiple of us will use it at one in between grabbing sections of hair. I'm finally old enough to buy my own and I'm so excited to get it! (22yrs old) so happy it's still being sold to this day!!

reviews.headline: Still going strong after 11 years
reviews.comments: I've had this straightener since sept 2014. It is still going strong and gets hot. I love it. It doesn't snag my hair like some other brands. It's definitely worth the money!

reviews.headline: It's alright
reviews.comments: I was expecting something more professional

reviews.headline: Forever my favorite straightener!
reviews.comments: I have thick, long, wavy hair. This was my first time investing in a good straightener & I'm so glad I did my research and got this one. My hair is finally perfectly straight from the roots to the ends! I'll probably never use a different brand ü©∑

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I have super thick, coarse, wavy, frizzy hair and I've had this straightener for 10 years! The one thing I'll say is that it is heavy on your hand,  I usually take breaks in between and that helps. I'm in the market for a new one and might rebuy!

reviews.headline: Tried and true!
reviews.comments: This is the holygrail of straighteners for the girls with the curly coarse type locks.   I have tried many hair tools and tricks and this is the absolute best.   Super sleek results for days!

reviews.headline: Hurts my hand
reviews.comments: As far as straightening your hair, it does the job. However, the tool itself is soo thick that my hand always hurts from holding it. Wouldn't recommend because of this. Way too bulky

media.headline: I love my new flat iron!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have to say I agree with the comments on this flat iron.  I have had this flat iron for 4 years, it still works the way it did the first time I used it.  I have fine hair, but a lot of it, which gets frizzy in humidity.  The plates glide easily through my hair, it doesn't get stuck like many other inexpensive flat irons do.  It makes my hair shiny that lasts until I wash my hair again, and keeps the frizz to a minimum in humid weather.  I use this flat iron mostly to curl my hair.  I have a Babyliss curling iron as well, but I use this flat iron to curl my hair almost every day, and the curls hold very well!  I would definitely recommend this styling tool!  It is so worth the money!
faceoff_positive.headline: Fabulous Flat Iron

faceoff_negative.comments: So......I too wanted to love this flat iron. I went to Ulta initially to buy a Chi but an employee that was helping me indicated that she hated the Chi and that the Babyliss was 100% better.  I get home eager to flat iron my daughters hair after washing and taking her braids out. The iron heats up fast and has multiple settings which is good.  However, you can barely hold the iron where you need to keep it tight within your grip because the handle is too hot!  It did not get my daughter's hair straight at all and it did not smooth any parts of her hair including the ends.  If you have to do several passes through the hair and it's still not straight at the highest setting then it just simply is not a good flat iron. If your hair is super thin it may work but other than that, I wouldn't recommend this iron. Returning it TODAY.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hate it!
